item.title: db笔记 - 事务1:隔离级别
item.description: 锁 an overview of isolation degree P0(Dirty Write) Read Uncommited P1(Dirty Read) Read Commited P4C(Lost Update of Cursor) Cursor Stability P4(Lost Update) References A Critique of ANSI SQL Isolation Levels 阅读笔记 A Critique of ANSI SQL Isolation Levels DB2 隔离级别 再谈数据库事务隔离性
